summary:
- **Capital Raising Type**: Placement  
- **Total Capital Raised**: AUD 8 million (16,000,000 shares at AUD 0.50 per share)  
- **Use of Proceeds**: Accelerate DFS and mine development at Bengwenyama PGM project  
- **Issue Date**: 19 June 2025  
- **Post-Issue Issued Capital**: 106,950,000 ordinary shares (fully paid)  
- **Outstanding Unquoted Securities**:  
  - 3,700,000 options (expiring 08-Jun-2026, exercise price AUD 0.875)  
  - 3,638,000 options (expiring 08-Jun-2026, exercise price AUD 0.875)  
  - 750,000 options (expiring 30-Sep-2027, exercise price AUD 0.70)
